synopsis: An animation commemorating the 10th anniversary of the THE IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls franchise. It was first unveiled during Day 2 of the "THE IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS 10th ANNIVERSARY M@GICAL WONDERLAND TOUR!!! Celebration Land" live concert, to preview an upcoming new story that will feature 190 idols coming in 2022.

title.jp: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls 10th Anniversary Celebration Animation
